wxTreeCtrl * m_treeCtrl

Detailed Description

This class manages the treelibrary on the left side of the Application.

void TreeSceneController::createSceneTree (  ) 

builds new scene-treectrl

Definition at line 86 of file TreeSceneController.cpp.

00087 {
00088         Scene* scene = Scene::getInstance();
00089         
00090         // reset tree
00091         m_treeCtrl->DeleteAllItems();
00092         
00093         // create root-entry
00094         wxTreeItemId rootID = m_treeCtrl->AddRoot(wxT("Root"));
00095         m_treeCtrl->SetItemImage(rootID, TreeCtrlIcon_Root);
00096         
00097         // create scene tree
00098         wxTreeItemId newID = m_treeCtrl->AppendItem(rootID, wxT("Szene"));
00099         m_treeCtrl->SetItemImage(newID, TreeCtrlIcon_Scene);
00100         createSceneTree(newID, scene->getRootAssembly());
00101         
00102         newID = m_treeCtrl->AppendItem(rootID, wxT("Papierkorb"));
00103         m_treeCtrl->SetItemImage(newID, TreeCtrlIcon_Trash);
00104         createSceneTree(newID, scene->getTrash());
00105         
00106         // expand root + scene
00107         m_treeCtrl->Expand(rootID);
00108         wxTreeItemIdValue cookie;
00109         m_treeCtrl->Expand(m_treeCtrl->GetFirstChild(rootID, cookie));
00110         
00111         // sort children of scene
00112         m_treeCtrl->SortChildren(m_treeCtrl->GetFirstChild(rootID, cookie));
00113 }

00050 {
00051         // Make an image list containing small icons
00052         wxImageList *images = new wxImageList(size, size, true);
00053         
00054         // should correspond to TreeCtrlIcon_xxx enum
00055         wxBusyCursor wait;
00056         
00057         // 5 icons
00058         wxIcon icons[5];
00059         icons[0] = wxIcon(icon_library_root_xpm);
00060         icons[1] = wxIcon(icon_library_scene_xpm);
00061         icons[2] = wxIcon(icon_library_trash_xpm);
00062         icons[3] = wxIcon(icon_library_assembly_xpm);
00063         icons[4] = wxIcon(icon_library_folder_xpm);
00064         
00065         int sizeOrig = icons[0].GetWidth();
00066         
00067         for (size_t i = 0; i < WXSIZEOF(icons); i++)
00068         {
00069                 if (size == sizeOrig)
00070                 {
00071                         images->Add(icons[i]);
00072                 }
00073                 else
00074                 {
00075                         images->Add(wxBitmap(wxBitmap(icons[i]).ConvertToImage().Rescale(size, size)));
00076                 }
00077         }
00078         
00079         // asign images
00080         m_treeCtrl->AssignImageList(images);
00081 }
